comments.author: sujonali1819
comments.body: Nice to see you in this field after the lending service. I also feel good to see provably I was probably the first person who used you as an escrow , It was a smooth deal.As the previous replies are saying be careful in this field. In lending, if you make some mistake then you will lose the fund that will be lent, but in this Escrow field if you make any mistake you will lose your Reputation which is 100x bigger than any amount of money.One more thing I want to suggest. If you do any escrow for a bounty campaign must make the deal crystal clear. Basically, the things that will do the distribution after ending the bounty. Bounty distribution may cost a huge amount of fees based on the network. So if the deal is you have to make the distribution must ask for the fees upfront (with the escrow fund). otherwise, it can create a big problem if the project team leaves after ending the campaign Btw best of luck!

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Hey, nice to see you create an escrow thread. I have a little concern, but not about your trust since you proved yourself trustworthy. The concern is that you may fall into a trap somehow and lose your reputation, or you may have to pay compensation. You know scammers are much smarter than us, and they are able to make us fools sometimes. Since you have a lending business here and it is running very well, I will advise you to focus there. And be very careful about your escrow service.
